metadata.description: A subterranean club hidden beneath the streets of London, where patrons don elaborate masks and engage in high-stakes games of chance and wit.
metadata.atmosphere: Sinister elegance: candelabras flicker, velvet drapes sway to the rhythm of jazz bands, and masked strangers whisper secrets in dark corners.
metadata.significance: A hub for espionage and intrigue, where players may uncover hidden agendas and unexpected alliances.
